name: Shatter (itch) (4n4c0nd4)
description:
This is a small space fighter-themed game developed without any game engine or game development libraries. It was created using only native Java where I used the Graphics library to render the objects on the screen. If you understand JSON and have some time to reverse engineer an object, then you can make some custom ships to play around with :D

How To Play

Shoot the targets. The color they are when you hit them determines the number of points that you get.

Collect ammo from the green balls and don't crash into the targets!

Controls

+            Volume Up
-            Volume Down    
Enter        Respawn
W           Thrust
S            Reverse Thrust
A            Turn Left
D            Turn Right
Space       Shoot
Shift         Boost

Singleplayer

F2        Load custom ship

Multiplayer

Ensure to have the server running when running the client - there is no UI :\

F12         Start match



Created by Heinrich Venter

Music by Juhani Junkala
